name: aws-google-login
description: Log into AWS with Google Apps

AWS_ROLE.description: The ARN of your Google web identity role set up in AWS IAM

GOOGLE_APP_ID.description: The client ID of your Google OAuth web application

GOOGLE_APP_SECRET.description: The client secret of your Google OAuth web application

GOOGLE_DOMAIN.description: The Google Apps domain to limit authentication to - failure to set this could result in unrestricted public access to your AWS account

BASE_URL.description: The URL this application is accessible on
